text: Trigonostoma costiferum is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cancellariidae, the nutmeg snails. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Indian Ocean off Madagascar and Tanzania. ==References== * Dautzenberg, Ph. (1929). Contribution à l'étude de la faune de Madagascar: Mollusca marina testacea. Faune des colonies françaises, III(fasc. 4). Société d'Editions géographiques, maritimes et coloniales: Paris. 321–636, plates IV-VII pp. * Hemmen J. (2007). Recent Cancellariidae. Wiesbaden, 428pp. * Petit R.E. (2009) George Brettingham Sowerby, I, II & III: their conchological publications and molluscan taxa. Zootaxa 2189: 1–218. Category:Cancellariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1832
title: Trigonostoma costiferum
